title: Nursing Practical Competency Enhancement: Reflective Scaffolding for Online Unstructured Mathematical Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary mathematics curriculum and problem-solving strategies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can systematically solve unstructured mathematical problems by applying a five-stage problem-solving process
Learners can enhance problem representation, monitoring, and evaluation skills through reflective scaffolding support
Learners can collaboratively solve problems while maintaining cognitive and social engagement in an online environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
